You ignore GPTs on ChatGPT.
 
But that's (much) better than prompting:

To learn how to create your own GPT, click here → https://lnkd.in/dTXmC44i
 
1. Prompt Maker: to generate ChatGPT prompts.
2. Gamma-PPT builder: to build perfect slides.
3. Business Plan maker: to build a business plan.
4. Mission-GPT: to find your mission as a creator.
5. Color Theory: to find your branding colors. 
6. ICP-GPT: to find your one audience. 
7. Topic-GPT: to expand one topic into many.
8. Calendar-GPT: to build a content calendar. 
9. Headline-GPT: to create your LinkedIn headline.
 
How to access all of them:
→ Click on 'GPTs'> Explore.
→ Then, type 'Ruben Hassid'. 
→ You'll find all of these GPTs.
